price: "Yã Maryamu! Ki yi ƙanƙan da kai ga Ubangijinki, kuma ki yi sujada, kuma ki yi rukũ'i tãre* da mãsu rukũ'i."
arabic: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ ٱقۡنُتِي لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسۡجُدِي وَٱرۡكَعِي مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ
footnotes: * Wannan ya nũna muhimmancin salla tãre da jama'a a masallaci, kõ da ga mãta. Sai dai hãli ya nũna an fi son mace ta yi salla a ɗakinta.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāmaryamu uq'nutī lirabbiki wa-us'judī wa-ir'kaʿī maʿa al-rākiʿīna
